mission_data.mission_description: Measures For Measures Part 2^Due to an encounter with new Skaraan weapons, you are ordered to trial some prototype equipment.^^Name and Level selectable (suggested 6-7)^Comms Buttons, GM Control Options^Multi-ship compatible (2.8.1+)*^*See read-me

event.name: Start Game Pressed
event.incoming_comms_text: Decryption Complete^The SS Hedy Lamarr, a secret civillian R&D station, has developed new prototype equipment and is requesting ships for field testing.^^You are instructed to proceed to the Quont system and rendezvous with the station for refit.^^Recently intercepted communications suggest that enemy forces may be aware of the station's location. Do not let the prototypes or the station be destroyed.

Prototype Details^^--Shield Boost (20% increase to each shield)^^--Demagnetize Hull (Temporarily allows ship to fly near mines)^^--Coolant Upgrade (+2 Engineering Coolant)^^--Bio Weapon (Deploys a wreck with piranhas. Requires triggering)^^--False Transponder (Broadcasts enemy ID signal.)^^--Shield Buffer (Stores energy from shields for power and shield recharge. Generates heat.)^^--Sensor Decoys (Deploy commandable sensor decoys for 2 minutes.)^^--Shield Angling (Focus shields to front, back, or balanced. Transfer loss.)^^--Organic Circuitry (Regenerating Damcon teams.)

set_ship_text.name: Prototypes
set_ship_text.desc: Scan to resend prototype description details.

log.text: Ordered to proceed to Quont system to pick up prototype weapon systems from SS Hedy Lamaar

event.name: Start Game Button

set_ship_text.name: Prototypes
set_ship_text.desc: MULTI-SHIP OPTIONS^Upgrade Shields: +20% Boost.^Extra Coolant: +25% coolant.^^SINGLE SHIP OPTIONS^Demagnetized Hull: Bypass mines. ^Bio-Weapon: Deploy pods of Piranhas.^Enemy Transponder: "Change" sides.^Shield Buffer: Boost shields & energy after combat.^Decoy Signal: Deploy decoy ships.^Angled Shields: Adjust shield power.^Organic Repairs: Regenerating repair systems.

event.incoming_comms_text: Prototype Details^^--Shield Boost (20% increase to each shield)^^--Demagnetize Hull (Temporarily allows ship to fly near mines)^^--Coolant Upgrade (+2 Engineering Coolant)^^--Bio Weapon (Deploys a wreck with piranhas. Requires triggering)^^--False Transponder (Broadcasts enemy ID signal.)^^--Shield Buffer (Stores energy from shields for power and shield recharge. Generates heat.)^^--Sensor Decoys (Deploy commandable sensor decoys for 2 minutes.)^^--Shield Angling (Focus shields to front, back, or balanced. Transfer loss.)^^--Organic Circuitry (Regenerating Damcon teams.)

event.name: Mission Create Second Wave
event.incoming_comms_text: Wait...what the---There are more vessels in-bound!^^They've found us!^^Please help!
Code Red: Quont System^^Intelligence confirms multiple enemy forces inbound!^^Defend the station at all costs!

create.name: Barbarous
create.hullKeys: Strongbow Longbow Brigantine small medium large

log.text: Second wave arrives--including pirates and mine-immune fighters!

event.name: Mission Invasion Force Wave 1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All enemy contacts have been eliminated!^^Impressive work, all of you.^^Dinner and drinks are on the station director.

log.text: First wave defeated! Drinks are on station director.
First wave of enemy forces arrives

event.name: Mission Invasion Warning
event.incoming_comms_text: Warning, all TSN ships!^^Unidentified vessels have been detected on approach to the system! ^^We have no defenses, you have to protect us!

event.name: Mission Sector Greeting
event.incoming_comms_text: Welcome to Quont, and the SS Hedy Lamarr.^^Your transponder signals have been approved. Please proceed to the station and dock so we can equip your ship with one of our prototypes.^^We have some dummy ships for you to test against, and sent you some information to review in advance.^^Most of our upgrades are modular, and can be exchanged at a later time.^^We look forward to working with the TSN!

Prototype Details^^--Shield Boost (20% increase to each shield)^^--Demagnetize Hull (Temporarily allows ship to fly near mines)^^--Coolant Upgrade (+2 Engineering Coolant)^^--Bio Weapon (Deploys a wreck with piranhas. Requires triggering)^^--False Transponder (Broadcasts enemy ID signal.)^^--Shield Buffer (Stores energy from shields for power and shield recharge. Generates heat.)^^--Sensor Decoys (Deploy commandable sensor decoys for 2 minutes.)^^--Shield Angling (Focus shields to front, back, or balanced. Transfer loss.)^^--Organic Circuitry (Regenerating Damcon teams.)

set_ship_text.name: Test 1
set_ship_text.desc: Admiral UE's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: Ship is on auto-pilot, feel free to fire.

set_ship_text.name: Test 2
set_ship_text.desc: VonErebos' Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is Admiral Von. I have test weapons enabled.

set_ship_text.name: Test 3
set_ship_text.desc: Devlain's Test Ship ^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is Devlain on remote control. Feel free to fire.

set_ship_text.name: Test 4
set_ship_text.desc: Evan's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is Evan on remote control. Fire when ready.

set_ship_text.name: Test 5
set_ship_text.desc: Gypsy's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: I'd say something snarky, but they're listening to this line. Ready when you are.

set_ship_text.name: Test 6
set_ship_text.desc: Greybeard's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: Someone messed up the engineering settings...

set_ship_text.name: Test 7
set_ship_text.desc: Captain Bennett's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: I like to learn on the job. Let's see what you think of those prototypes.

set_ship_text.name: Test 8
set_ship_text.desc: Neal's Test Ship^^DESTROY THIS TARGET
set_ship_text.hailtext: I wrote this scenario. Hope you enjoy it. Tell Greybeard about any bugs.

folder_arme.name: Per Ship Upgrade Offer Trigger and Dock Failure

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Enhanced Shield Generators^[Automatic}^^Boosts maximum front and rear shields by 20% each. ^^Note: Do not remove if stress damage has been incurred.

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Demagnetized Hull. Vessel will not trigger mines for ~17 seconds after activation. 3 minute reset. [Comms Activated]

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Hyper-Compressed Coolant.^[Engineering Controlled]^^Boosts total available coolant by 25%.

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Bio Pods (x4) ^[Comms Activated]^^Deploys pod with 3 Piranhas.^^Location: 600m to ship aft. ^Trigger Delay: 7 Seconds ^Requires proximity detonation, 1500m ^Reload: 30 seconds.

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: False Transponder^[Comms Activated] ^^Masks ship signal and broadcasts enemy ID code. ^^Duration: 7-15 seconds ^Reset: 5 minutes. ^^WARNING:Equiped ship is treated as enemy for all purposes when active. ^^May cause missiles or drones to re-target.

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: READY^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Deploy Decoys^[Comms Activated]^^Deploy two un-armed escort "ships" to aft. ^Comms directable ^^Duration: 2 minute power supply, eliminated upon shield damage. ^^Note: Requires resupply at station.

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Angled Deflectors^[Current State: BALANCED]^[Comms Controlled] ^^Can be Balanced, Forward, or Rear.^ Selected Shield Max is raised 50%, reverse shield reduced by 50%; transfers partial strength to active shield. ^^Mitigates gravitational damage upon reset.^^Exchange Bonus: +50% Maximum, +22% of current reverse shield strength ^^Exchange Loss: -50% Maximum, -75% current shield strength

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Organic Repair Circuitry ^[Automatic]^^Damaged repair systems regenerate capacity with time.^^Rate: Restores capacity of up to 1 Damcom member/minute

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: READY^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: ACTIVE^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: OVERLOADED^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: DISCHARGING^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Shield Buffer^CURRENT STATE: DISCHARGING^^[Active Shields Required]^[Comms Activated]^^Buffers power in Engineering subsystems; deactivate to restore shields and energy. ^NOTE: Generates increasing heat.^NOTE: Not rated for 7+ cycles.^^Cycle Time: 5 seconds ^Energy Recovery: 10 units/cycle/cycle ^Shield Recovery: 5% averaged damage/cycle ^Reset Discharge: 15 seconds/cycle

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Angled Deflectors (FORWARD). Can be set forward, rear, or balanced. Boosts selected Shield Max by 50%, reduces reverse side by 50%. Transfer loss upon switching, and counteracts gravitational stress upon reset. [Comms Controlled]

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Angled Deflectors (REAR). Can be set forward, rear, or balanced. Boosts selected Shield Max by 50%, reduces reverse side by 50%. Transfer loss upon switching, and counteracts gravitational stress upon reset. [Comms Controlled]

set_ship_text.name: Ship |updateInfo|
set_ship_text.desc: Prototype Installed: Angled Deflectors (BALANCED). Can be set forward, rear, or balanced. Boosts selected Shield Max by 50%, reduces reverse side by 50%. Transfer loss upon switching, and counteracts gravitational stress upon reset. [Comms Controlled]

big_message.title: Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: The prototypes have fallen into enemy hands!

log.text: All player ships destroyed! Mission failed!

big_message.title: Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: The station's research has been lost.

log.text: All enemy ships defeated! Mission Success!
